articles.title: Amazon releases Christmas advert starring a ballerina whose performance is cancelled by Covid - Daily Mail
articles.description: Online giant Amazon has released its heartwarming Christmas advert featuring a determined ballerina who performs for her neighbours in the snow after her show is cancelled by the Covid-19 crisis.
